summary: Comprehensive testing of Beefy-style API refactor completed. All 16 backend tests passed. Frontend integration with new endpoints working correctly. APY Breakdown card displaying all fields.
passed_tests: GET /api/lps?chain_id=84532 returns testnet mock LP prices (200.0)
GET /api/lps?chain_id=8453 returns mainnet LP prices with _meta
GET /api/tvl returns TVL per vault with dataQuality field
GET /api/apy returns APY breakdown per vault with all required fields
GET /api/apy/{vault_id} returns APY breakdown for specific vault
GET /api/vaults returns list of vaults (legacy endpoint)
Admin login rejects wrong password with 401
Admin auth check returns authenticated=true after login
Vaults page loads with TVL and APY from Beefy endpoints
Vault detail page shows APY Breakdown card with all fields (Vault APR, Vault APY, Trading APR, Total APY, Compoundings/Year, Performance Fee)
Admin panel shows vault management correctly after login
context_for_next_testing_agent: Beefy-style API endpoints (/api/prices, /api/lps, /api/tvl, /api/apy) fully working. Frontend consumes these APIs via beefyApi object in /app/frontend/src/lib/api.js. Test vault on testnet (chain 84532) shows 0 TVL and 0 APY as expected since no real contracts deployed. APY Breakdown card in vault detail page shows all fields. tradingApr is hardcoded to 0.

mocked_apis.testnet_prices: Testnet (chain 84532) token prices return mock value 100.0
mocked_apis.testnet_lps: Testnet (chain 84532) LP prices return mock value 200.0
mocked_apis.trading_apr: tradingApr is always 0 (hardcoded, would need DEX volume data)

notes: All Beefy-style endpoints working as designed
Testnet data shows 0 TVL/APY because underlying contracts are not deployed
APY Breakdown card shows: vaultApr, vaultApy, tradingApr, totalApy, compoundingsPerYear (1,460), beefyPerformanceFee (4.5%)
